timeline.bodyText: Should we also have a validate() method inside VersioningConfiguration and call it from here? The status field validation can be done in it.
timeline.author: anjalshireesh

replies.bodyText: VersioningConfiguration has the check in the constructor. I do not think we need to validate status field here because of it.
replies.author: balamurugana

timeline.author: anjalshireesh

replies.bodyText: No. We need to return three possible values. None, Boolean.FALSE or Boolean.TRUE.
replies.author: balamurugana

timeline.author: anjalshireesh

replies.bodyText: Simplified to just print the status.
replies.author: balamurugana
